titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1808) to regulate assault weapons, to ensure that the right to keep and bear arms is not unlimited, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1808) to regulate assault weapons, to ensure that the right to keep and bear arms is not unlimited, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 117-448, by Mr. McGovern.
Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 1808 with 1 hour of general debate. Motion to recommit allowed. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 93.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1302.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 215 - 205 (Roll no. 407).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 217 - 211 (Roll no. 408).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolutions sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 1808.
